channel.title: Timesplitters Rpg

item.title: Timesplitters Rpg
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Not Sure If This Is The Right Section But…

Im Starting This Project Tonight And I Hope To Have It Finished By Saturday Hopefully…

Story Line :

Timesplitters Have Taken Over A Time Station In Space, And Are Using The Time Crystals To Power They’re Time Machine.Your First Mission Is To Infiltrate The Spaceship And Secure It. Then You Travel Through 20 Different Places In Time And Space. Your Main Mission Is To Apprehend The Time Crystals From Around The Universe And Use Them In One Final Strike Agaisnt The Timesplitters And The Mysterious Masked Figure.
List of Places, Times Will Come Later:

Egypt - Tombs;
China - Resturant;
Tokyo - Cyberden;
Graveyard;
Village;
Chemical Plant;
Planet X Part 1;
U.K - Mansion;
San Francisco - Docks;
Spaceways;
1990 - Siberia;
1932 - Chicago;
1895 - Notre Dame;
2280 - Return To Planet X;
1853 - Wild West;
1972 - Atomsmasher;
1920 - Aztec Ruins;
2315 - Robot Factory;
2401 - Earth;
1924 - Scotland;
1969 - Russia;
1969 - Train;
1994 - House Of Mdness;
1994 - What Lies Below;
2052 - Breaking And Entering;
2052 - U Genius - U Genix

I Hope To Be Done By Saturday, Demo On Wednesday Or Thurs
I’ll Show Some Pics Too
